block.title: MC:T1 - Minecraft for Type 1 Diabetes -- LOCAL
block.html:
Type 1 diabetes can be tough. Whether learning to control your own condition, trying to help a recently-diagnosed family member, or just getting your friends to understand, the road to good diabetes management can be difficult, even frustrating at times.

But it doesn’t have to be.

Learn through play

Created by the founders of Magikcraft.io, Minecraft for Type 1 Diabetes (MC:T1) is an open-source Minecraft mod aimed at teaching diabetics and non-diabetics about the condition. We want to leverage the inherent engagement and fun of gaming to help kids (and adults) work through tough topics.

What better game than Minecraft?

With over 74 million people playing every month, Minecraft is the most popular game of this generation. Players as young as 5 can enjoy the easily understood controls, enormous depth and myriad of different play-styles. The huge player-base and ease of access makes Minecraft not only a great gaming experience but a brilliant tool for education, activism and health.

block.title: Solve Mazes, Unlock Puzzles, Fight Monsters!
block.html:
Dive into adventure with an immersive puzzle-platforming minigame. Players must use their brains, skills and bravery to clear eleven puzzle, challenge and mob-filled levels, culminating in a bombastic final boss-fight.

Learn to manage diabetes

During early levels, players can experience and experiment with key concepts of type 1 diabetes management, including:

 

  • Insulin and Blood Glucose Levels (BGLs)
  • Hypoglycaemia (Low Blood Glucose) and Hyperglycaemia (High Blood Glucose)
  • How exercise effects Insulin
  • The impact of Food choice and Glycaemic Index on BGLs

 

As they progress, players learn to monitor and manage the different aspects of their condition in order to unlock secrets and progress through the world.

 

Gain special powers

In MC:T1, diabetes isn’t all doom and gloom. Through the magic of Glykosan alchemists, well-managed players can unlock special abilities like superspeed and high-jump, opening up a new world of gaming and combat possibilities. But beware – with great power comes great responsibility…

 

Save the world

The evil Wither Demon has declared war on the alchemists of [worldname]. Only players who master their condition, and the powers it brings, will be able to conquer his fortress and restore peace to the land.
